4 mowunge namawaliya mese ya: rubange gothrayen sakkurge puth shammuwa ya. 5 simiyonge gothrayen horige puth shapath ya. 6 judage gothrayen jepunnege puth kaleb ya. 7 issakarge gothrayen josepge puth igal ya. 8 eprayimge gothrayen nunge puth hosheya ya. 9 benjaminge gothrayen rapuge puth palthi ya. 10 sabulonge gothrayen sodige puth gaddiyel ya. 11 josepge gothrayen, enam manassege gothrayen susige puth gaddi ya. 12 dange gothrayen gemallige puth ammiyel ya. 13 aasherge gothrayen mikayelge puth sethur ya. 14 napthalige gothrayen wopsige puth nabi ya. 15 gadge gothrayen mabige puth gewuyel ya.

kithuluthuwa pradeshaye di dumriye hapi thuwala laba pinnawala ali anathagarayata mita masa thunakata pera gena enu labu ali patawata batahira waidya prathikarawalata amatharawa deshiya waidya prathikarada labadimata ali anathagaraya piyawara gena thibe.pasugiya okthobar masaye thunwani dina rathri galoya, thrikunamalaya, kithuluthuwa, pradeshaye di alin dedenaku ha patawun dedenaku dumriye hapimen alin dedena ema sthanayema miyagiya athara, thawath ali patawaku pasudina miya giye ya.diwi beragath ali patawa prathikara sandaha pinnawala ali anathagarayata yomu kerunu athara, ema prathikarawalin pasuwa ali patawa kramayen suwaya labamin pasuweyi.me ali patawata labadena batahira waidya prathikarawalata amatharawa jathika sathwodyanaye adhyaksha jenaral bhashwara senanka gunarathna mahathage upades paridi deshiya waidya prathikara da labadimata katayuthu yoda thibe.kramayen suwaya labana ali patawage saukhya thaththwaya pilibandawa pasugiyada ali anathagarayata giya widuli sandesha ha thorathuru thakshana amathi ranjith siyambaalapitiya mahatha da ehi niladharingen thorathura wimasiya.dumriye hapimen ali patawage pada dekaka asthi bindi thibini..
